name: Sweet Hero Story
description:
Sweet heroe story is an amusing 3 eliminate game, there are different models, each model has different rule, you can freely enjoy the feeling of fighting monster, or collecting the candies, and so on.

Features,
**All levels are Free,
**Colorful Candies,
**Cool Monsters,
**Battle system,
**Suitable for all ages,
**Cool particle,
**Sound,
**Special efficiency,
**Share it with others.

If you have idea about it, you can feedback to us, we are appreciated to it!!!

Thanks all for support!!!
